text: Hugo Sánchez Portugal (June 15, 1984 – November 8, 2014) was a Mexican footballer and sports commentator with Televisa Deportes. He was the son of former player and manager of the Mexican national team, Hugo Sánchez. On November 8, 2014, he was found dead in his Polanco apartment. The cause of death was later confirmed to be carbon monoxide poisoning.Confirmaron causa de muerte de Hugo Sánchez Portugal ==References== Category:1984 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Accidental deaths Category:Mexican footballers Category:Footballers from Madrid Category:Deaths from carbon monoxide poisoning
title: Hugo Sánchez Portugal
